title: Bugsplat right before loading screen
body:
Every time I load a game I get a bugsplat after champ select, right as I start loading into the loading screen. When I try to reconnect to the game I instantly get bugsplats and it's impossible to load in. I tried submitting a support ticket but you can't log in to the support website right now so I figured I would post here for a faster response.

I can post my logs if it helps.

Thanks

EDIT: I have updated my computer, my graphics drivers, repaired my client, uninstalled and reinstalled the game.

replies.body:
When a bugsplat happens, it's usually because of a poor interaction with your display drivers or a problem with your hardware. We've consolidated a list of common solutions in our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I recommend making those steps your next move.

Let me know if those solutions worked for you or not.
